roleset.name: having at least 2 structural forms during a life cycle

example.text: That of the white component was pleomorphic and spindle cell sarcoma with a storiform pattern, resembling malignant fibrous histiocytoma (Fig. 1e).

roleset.note: PLEOMORPHIC-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to nondysmorphic? morph-v monomorphic-j (from pleomorphic.01-j)
